00013 //---------------------------------------------------------
00014 //   TextStyleDialog

00017 TextStyleDialog::TextStyleDialog(QWidget* parent, const char* name)
00018    : TextStyleBase(parent, name)
00019       {
00020 printf("mops 1\n");
00021       styles = textStyles;
00022       QFontDatabase fdb;
00023       QStringList families = fdb.families();
00024       fonts = 0;
00025       for (QStringList::Iterator f = families.begin(); f != families.end(); ++f) {
00026             QString family = *f;
00027             if (fdb.isSmoothlyScalable(family)) {
00028                   fontName->insertItem(family);
00029                   ++fonts;
00030                   }
00031             }
00032 printf("mops 2\n");
00033       textNames->setSelectionMode(Q3ListBox::Single);
00034       textNames->clear();
00035       for (iTextStyle i = styles.begin(); i != styles.end(); ++i) {
00036             TextStyle* s = &*i;
00037             textNames->insertItem(s->name);
00038             }
00039 
00040       connect(textNames, SIGNAL(highlighted(int)), SLOT(nameSelected(int)));
00041       connect(buttonOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(ok()));
00042       connect(buttonApply, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(apply()));
00043       connect(fontBold, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(fontChanged()));
00044       connect(fontUnderline, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(fontChanged()));
00045       connect(fontItalic, SIGNAL(clicked()), SLOT(fontChanged()));
00046       connect(fontSize, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)), SLOT(fontSizeChanged(int)));
00047       connect(fontName, SIGNAL(activated(int)), SLOT(fontNameChanged(int)));
00048       connect(halignGroup, SIGNAL(clicked(int)), SLOT(hclicked(int)));
00049       connect(valignGroup, SIGNAL(clicked(int)), SLOT(vclicked(int)));
00050       connect(offsetType, SIGNAL(clicked(int)), SLOT(otclicked(int)));
00051       current = -1;
00052       textNames->setCurrentItem(0);
00053       }

00055 //---------------------------------------------------------
00056 //   nameSelected
00057 //---------------------------------------------------------
00058 
00059 void TextStyleDialog::nameSelected(int n)
00060       {
00061       if (current != -1)
00062             saveStyle(current);
00063       TextStyle* s = &styles[n];
00064 
00065       printf("selected %d <%s><%s>\n", n, s->name.latin1(), s->family.latin1());
00066 
00067       fontBold->setOn(s->bold);
00068       fontItalic->setOn(s->italic);
00069       fontUnderline->setOn(s->underline);
00070       fontSize->setValue(s->size);
00071 
00072       int hbutton = 0;
00073       if (s->align & ALIGN_RIGHT)
00074             hbutton = 1;
00075       else if (s->align & ALIGN_HCENTER)
00076             hbutton = 2;
00077       int vbutton = 0;
00078       if (s->align & ALIGN_BOTTOM)
00079             vbutton = 1;
00080       else if (s->align & ALIGN_VCENTER)
00081             vbutton = 2;
00082       halignGroup->setButton(hbutton);
00083       valignGroup->setButton(vbutton);
00084       referencePos->setCurrentItem(s->anchor);
00085 
00086       QString str;
00087       int ot = 0;
00088       if (s->offsetType == OFFSET_ABS) {
00089             ot = 0;
00090             xOffset->setText(str.setNum(s->xoff/DPMM, 'f', 2));
00091             yOffset->setText(str.setNum(s->yoff/DPMM, 'f', 2));
00092             }
00093       if (s->offsetType == OFFSET_REL) {
00094             ot = 1;
00095             xOffset->setText(str.setNum(s->xoff, 'f', 2));
00096             yOffset->setText(str.setNum(s->yoff, 'f', 2));
00097             }
00098       else if (s->offsetType == OFFSET_SPATIUM) {
00099             ot = 2;
00100             xOffset->setText(str.setNum(s->xoff, 'f', 2));
00101             yOffset->setText(str.setNum(s->yoff, 'f', 2));
00102             }
00103       offsetType->setButton(ot);
00104 
00105       QFont f(s->family);
00106       f.setPixelSize(s->size);
00107       f.setItalic(s->italic);
00108       f.setUnderline(s->underline);
00109       f.setBold(s->bold);
00110       fontSample->setFont(f);
00111       fontSample->setText(tr("Ich und du, Müllers Kuh"));
00112       int i;
00113       for (i = 0; i < fonts; ++i) {
00114             QString ls = fontName->text(i);
00115             if (ls.lower() == s->family.lower()) {
00116                   fontName->setCurrentItem(i);
00117                   break;
00118                   }
00119             }
00120       if (i == fonts) {
00121             printf("font not in list: <%s>\n", s->family.lower().latin1());
00122             }
00123       current = n;
00124       }

00126 //---------------------------------------------------------
00127 //   fontChanged
00128 //---------------------------------------------------------
00129 
00130 void TextStyleDialog::fontChanged()
00131       {
00132       QFont f(fontSample->font());
00133       f.setItalic(fontItalic->isOn());
00134       f.setUnderline(fontUnderline->isOn());
00135       f.setBold(fontBold->isOn());
00136       fontSample->setFont(f);
00137       }
00138 
00139 //---------------------------------------------------------
00140 //   fontSizeChanged
00141 //---------------------------------------------------------
00142 
00143 void TextStyleDialog::fontSizeChanged(int n)
00144       {
00145       QFont f(fontSample->font());
00146       f.setPixelSize(n);
00147       fontSample->setFont(f);
00148       }
00149 
00150 //---------------------------------------------------------
00151 //   fontNameChanged
00152 //---------------------------------------------------------
00153 
00154 void TextStyleDialog::fontNameChanged(int)
00155       {
00156       QFont f(fontSample->font());
00157       f.setFamily(fontName->currentText());
00158       fontSample->setFont(f);
00159       }

00161 //---------------------------------------------------------
00162 //   saveStyle
00163 //---------------------------------------------------------
00164 
00165 void TextStyleDialog::saveStyle(int n)
00166       {
00167       TextStyle* s = &styles[n];
00168       s->bold      = fontBold->isOn();
00169       s->italic    = fontItalic->isOn();
00170       s->underline = fontUnderline->isOn();
00171       s->size      = fontSize->value();
00172       s->anchor    = (Anchor)(referencePos->currentItem());
00173       s->family    = strdup(fontName->currentText().latin1());  // memory leak
00174 
00175       bool ok;
00176       double val = xOffset->text().toDouble(&ok);
00177       if (ok)
00178             s->xoff = val * ((s->offsetType == OFFSET_ABS) ? DPMM : 1.0);
00179       else
00180             printf("bad xoff float value\n");
00181 
00182       val = yOffset->text().toDouble(&ok);
00183       if (ok)
00184             s->yoff = val * ((s->offsetType == OFFSET_ABS) ? DPMM : 1.0);
00185       else
00186             printf("bad yoff float value\n");
00187       }
00188 
00189 //---------------------------------------------------------
00190 //   hclicked
00191 //---------------------------------------------------------
00192 
00193 void TextStyleDialog::hclicked(int id)
00194       {
00195       TextStyle* s = &styles[current];
00196       s->align &= ~(ALIGN_LEFT | ALIGN_RIGHT | ALIGN_HCENTER);
00197       if (id == 0)
00198             s->align |= ALIGN_LEFT;
00199       else if (id == 1)
00200             s->align |= ALIGN_RIGHT;
00201       else if (id == 2)
00202             s->align |= ALIGN_HCENTER;
00203       }
00204 
00205 //---------------------------------------------------------
00206 //   vclicked
00207 //---------------------------------------------------------
00208 
00209 void TextStyleDialog::vclicked(int id)
00210       {
00211       TextStyle* s = &styles[current];
00212       s->align &= ~(ALIGN_TOP | ALIGN_BOTTOM | ALIGN_VCENTER);
00213       if (id == 0)
00214             s->align |= ALIGN_TOP;
00215       else if (id == 1)
00216             s->align |= ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00217       else if (id == 2)
00218             s->align |= ALIGN_VCENTER;
00219       }
00220 
00221 //---------------------------------------------------------
00222 //   otclicked
00223 //---------------------------------------------------------
00224 
00225 void TextStyleDialog::otclicked(int id)
00226       {
00227       TextStyle* s = &styles[current];
00228       switch(id) {
00229             case 0:
00230                   s->offsetType = OFFSET_ABS;
00231                   break;
00232             case 1:
00233                   s->offsetType = OFFSET_REL;
00234                   break;
00235             case 2:
00236                   s->offsetType = OFFSET_SPATIUM;
00237                   break;
00238             }
00239       }

00241 //---------------------------------------------------------
00242 //   ok

00244 
00245 void TextStyleDialog::ok()
00246       {
00247       apply();
00248       done(0);
00249       }
00250 
00251 //---------------------------------------------------------
00252 //   apply
00253 //---------------------------------------------------------
00254 
00255 void TextStyleDialog::apply()
00256       {
00257       saveStyle(current);
00258       textStyles = styles;
00259       emit textStyleChanged();
00260       }
